name: Laser Defender (petergambell)
description:
Pilot your craft and blast the waves of enemies that stand against you!

Laser Defender is a Galaga/Space Invaders style shoot em' up, which pits your fighter against waves of enemy ships.

See if you can beat my high score of 14,600, lasting until Wave 32.

The game can be played in the browser (should work on all modern browsers) or as a Windows x86 application. To play the Windows version, simply download the LaserDefender_v1.2.zip file, extract the contents to a location, then run the LaserDefender_v1.2 executable.

The default resolution for the game is 1024x786 (4:3), but it is playable in any of the resolutions offered when starting the Windows version of the game.
